actions.name: Update share
actions.description:
Updates a specified share.
 You can update these attributes:
 
 
 
 display_name, which also changes the
 name of the share.
 
 
 
 
 display_description, which also changes the
 description of the share.
 
 
 
 
 is_public. Changes the level of visibility.
 
 
 
 If you try to update other attributes, they retain their
 previous values.

actions.name: Delete share
actions.description: Deletes a specified share.

tenant_id.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

share_id.description: The ID of an existing share.

X-Openstack-Manila-Api-Version.description:
The HTTP header to specify a valid Shared File Systems API
 micro-version. For example,
 "X-Openstack-Manila-Api-Version: 2.6".
 If you omit this header, the default micro-version is 2.0.

actions.name: Allow access
actions.description: Grants access to a specified share.

actions.name: Deny access
actions.description: Denies access to a specified share.

actions.name: List access rules
actions.description: Lists access rules for a specified share.

actions.name: Reset share state
actions.description:
Administrator only. Explicitly updates the state of a specified share.
 Use the policy.json file to grant permissions for this action to other roles.

actions.name: Force-delete share
actions.description:
Administrator only. Force-deletes a specified share in any state.
 Use the policy.json file to grant permissions for this action to other roles.

actions.name: Extend share
actions.description: Increases the size of a specified share.

actions.name: Shrink share
actions.description: Shrinks the size of a specified share.

actions.name: Migrate share
actions.description:
Migrates a specified share from one back end to another. (Since
 API v2.5.)
 
 
 You can migrate a specified share from one back end to another but
 both back ends must set the
 driver_handles_share_servers parameter to
 False. This action is not supported if one of the
 back ends is handled by a share driver. You can configure a back
 end in the manila.conf file.

tenant_id.description: The tenant ID in a multi-tenancy cloud.

share_id.description: The ID of an existing share.

X-Openstack-Manila-Api-Version.description:
The HTTP header to specify a valid Shared File Systems API
 micro-version. For example,
 "X-Openstack-Manila-Api-Version: 2.6".
 If you omit this header, the default micro-version is 2.0.

actions.name: Update security service
actions.description:
Updates a specified security service.
 
 If the security service is in active state, you
 can update only the name and description
 attributes. A security service in active state is
 attached to a share network with an associated share server.

actions.name: Delete security service
actions.description: Deletes a specified security service.

actions.name: Set extra spec
actions.description:
Sets an extra specification of the share type.
 
 It is up to each driver implementation what extra specification
 keys to use. For details, see 
 Capabilities and Extra-Specs and documentation for a
 specified driver.

actions.name: Add share type access
actions.description:
Adds share type access for a specified project.
 You can add access to private share types only.

actions.name: Remove share type access
actions.description:
Removes share type access from a specified project.
 You can remove access from private share types only.

actions.name: Reset share instance state
actions.description:
Administrator only. Explicitly updates the state of a specified share instance.
 Use the policy.json file to grant permissions for this action to other roles.

actions.name: Force-delete share instance
actions.description:
Administrator only. Force-deletes a specified share instance.
 Use the policy.json file to grant permissions for this action to other roles.
